website_summaries.verdict: These homeopathic tablets offer a natural alternative to medicinal motion sickness relief.
pros: Natural relief for nausea and dizziness due to motion
Stimulates your body's natural healing response to combat motion sickness
Good for motion sickness and vertigo
cons: Homeopathic ingredients are more effective for some people than others

website_summaries.verdict: All-natural ingredients make this inexpensive treatment a great option.
pros: Made of plant, mineral, and animal natural ingredients
Quick-dissolving tablets work well for motion sickness or nausea
With 50 tablets, this is a great inexpensive option
cons: These tablets are not effective for everyone

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS, period. No bad side effects and safe for children too.
customer_reviews.text: We have completely transformed our diet, since receiving diagnosis of IBS and leaky gut syndrome; so we have less need for this product. We do, however, keep it on hand for those random times we have unexpected discomfort after eating out or away from home. When we were having lots of gastric problems, this was often the ONLY thing that gave relief and gave it almost immediately! I carry a bottle around with me all the time, even though I haven't needed to use them more than twice the past three years. I guess it's my little sense of reassurance, but one I don't want to be without.
customer_reviews.author: Linee7B

customer_reviews.title: No more motion sickness!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, especially on road trips with my children. We are cursed with motion sickness in several children. Traveling can be quite miserable with tummy aches and potential outpouring of stomach contents. It's safe and effective without the drowsiness that goes with Dramamine. I've also used it for general tummy problems at home and it seems to relieve those, too. The pills are very small and dissolve easily, which is a blessing in itself when I'm medicating my children under 10 or so. There's no real taste either. I'm thrilled to have found a natural alternative for treating motion sickness!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of many

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for me
customer_reviews.text: Recently went Alaska cruising. Had some rolling time on the ship. Nothing huge, but others had some motion sickness. I am prone to motion sickness, so had this on hand. When the ship began its gentle rolling, I could feel a little rolling inside, like the start of what becomes motion sickness. I then popped two tablets under my tongue.and within a short time I literally felt totally grounded and enjoying the sway of the ship. I used them three or four times over the course of the week and each time I had the same experience. Great for me. Perhaps they will work for you. No side effects either.
customer_reviews.author: jislove

customer_reviews.title: Works for me, better than Rx
customer_reviews.text: My former, now retired doctor knew exactly what l was describing as he had similar vertigo episodes. He prescribed meclizine, which my current doctor continued, but, after several yrs, l gave up. It didn't seem to help. I use several Hyland's products, tried this out of desperation. So glad l did. I will see my doctor soon, will bring this along to let him know.
customer_reviews.author: skywatcher

customer_reviews.title: I gave her the correct dose alone with a ginger candy to suck and.
customer_reviews.text: Whether it did the trick or was placebo, it worked! My little one (now age 7) has experienced air sickness every time we fly. We take at least one overseas trip a year and she was starting to get anxious about "the part of the flight when I throw up." I got these, explained to her it was medicine to stop the throw up feeling, I gave her the correct dose along with a ginger candy to suck and... success! From the east coast to Hawaii and back and not one problem.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wallach

customer_reviews.title: seem to work pretty well, just watch ingredients as I did find ...
customer_reviews.text: seem to work pretty well, just watch ingredients as I did find lactose listed in most of their products, which can cause gas and bloating in some people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Customer who will continue to purchase this product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve replaced Antacids with Hyland’s Gas tablets and noticed a big difference in my digestion issues. And as of 3 weeks now I’ve been able to completely stop taking Acid Reducer Pills I’ve taken for 15 Years. I would try this OTC Acid Reducer then another one then another one. This is last product I think (and hope) I’ll ever have to buy for my gastric issues! Sometimes when I eat heavy and/or spicy foods late in the evening I have issues at night but about 75% relief versus OTC products. Very Happy Customer who will continue to purchase this product!
customer_reviews.author: Patty P.

customer_reviews.title: Best motion sickness medicine and natural!
customer_reviews.text: I have always had motion sickness when being a passenger in a car. I was unable to look anywhere but straight ahead without feeling nauseous and getting a headache. I purchased this for going on an 18 hour car trip (I also purchased the more well known brand just in case). This was like a miracle for me! I was able to turn around to the get things for my children in the backseat, look at my phone, and actually look at the scenery around me! I think I took it every 6 hours. I never had to use the other brand medicine and actually returned it when we got home. I will definitely purchase this again whenever needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer13

customer_reviews.title: does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Hyland's never disappoints, and this is no exception. I take ALOT of supplements daily, and sometimes- I don't know why or exactly which one causes it- they give me killer heartburn. I have discovered that taking marshmallow supplements at the same time I swallow all the others- in a few big gulps- dramatically cuts down on the burning, but when it persists, this does the trick almost instantly. It dissolves under your tongue immediately, and is pleasant tasting. And after learning that taking OTC or prescription drugs for indigestion backfires, and inevitably causes more symptoms, natural cures are the obvious way to go. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: nikki zazz

customer_reviews.title: Organic Schmorganic
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I suffer from car sickness especially on windy roads. We took these tablets with us on our trip to Hawaii, where we drove the harrowingly windy roads of Hana Highway from OGG airport to Hana Town, a long trek of three hours. We usually take Dramamine but we were sold on Hyland's because it's organic, and we immediately regretted that decision after my wife threw up three times on the trip and I yacked once. It simply didn't work. On the way back down to the airport, we took Dramamine instead and we drove Hana Highway like the locals without even a hint of nausea.
customer_reviews.author: Lando Garcia

customer_reviews.title: will not ever be without these
customer_reviews.text: These were a lifesaver for my little one with IBS. We tried everything, including a low fodmap diet but he still had severe aches often. IBgard helped (and we still use it) but this was a game changer. He is non-verbal, but will bring these to me when he needs them so I know he knows the relief they provide.
customer_reviews.author: Caley G

customer_reviews.title: Only thing that has ever worked for my motion sickness!
customer_reviews.text: I have long suffered from motion sickness. I get it from something as simple as sitting in a hot tub! I also recently had, what I felt was a bout of vertigo. Nothing has ever really worked for me. Dramamine usually didn't even take the edge off and the wrist bands also did nothing. This has been a life saver for me!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Henning

customer_reviews.title: Let's be serious, we all get gassy. My ...
customer_reviews.text: Let's be serious, we all get gassy. My body hates milk so these gas relief tablets are a Godsend especially if you're out and about. No one wants to be a one man band while amongst friends or in public. These tablets do the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Slightly funny taste but easily tolerable
customer_reviews.text: As someone with IBS, these are one of the only things that can relieve my gassy stomach! And I literally mean relieve. Haven't used in a while due to pregnancy/breast feeding and no evidence of safety with these things but definitely will be using again in the future! Slightly funny taste but easily tolerable! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Very effective for gas, not that I have gas or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Better than dramamine for wife and kids
customer_reviews.text: My wife and daughter both suffer from car sickness on long trips (or maybe its my driving - hah!) So they need to take something to relieve the nausea and dizziness. They used to take dramamine, but as it because harder to find in stock at the local grocery store, I decided to try ordering something online. That is when I came across this product. I decided to give it a shot and couldn't be happier! Both my wife and daughter enjoy the flavor and say it really works! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: George Crawford

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I get sick whenever I ride in the back seat of the car. I got these for a trip to Ireland thinking I would need them for our ferry ride to the Aran Islands but I ended up having to ride in the back seat of the car for the whole trip! The only time I got sick was when I forgot to take these right away, but then when I took them they worked very quickly! My niece who is a nurse also tried them and they worked for her at half the dose! I am very very happy, it was the best purchase I made for the trip! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Abee

customer_reviews.title: BEST Motion Sickness Remedy Around!!
customer_reviews.text: My son and I both suffer from car sickness, and living in the Ozark Mountains, it's not easy just to go to Walmart. We dissolve one of these under our tongue before any car ride and we never have any issues. Neither my son nor I have ever been sick after taking one of these tablets. They also work for when you feel sick if you've forgotten to take one. GREAT value for the money. Best product out there!
customer_reviews.author: OctoSquishy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! First bought it on clearance at Whole Foods as I was attracted to its “Natural” description but they don’t sell it there anymore I was told. I was hesitant and not hopeful when I first tried it but wow, it’s wonderful. I used it to work on a long car ride which would normally leave me extremely nauseated after looking at a computer screen for hours on the move but I didn’t feel sick one bit. I now use it when flying, sitting in the back seat of cars, or on boats as I am extremely motion sickness prone. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: It made me sleepy in the middle of the day.
customer_reviews.text: I got this in hopes it wouldn't make me sleepy like Dramamine but I was wrong. Although it made me a little less sleepy not much noticeable difference between be less drowsy Dramamine and this product. I still got knocked out by this. I may test it out again once I take my cruise. I just took it today and walked around my house in the middle of the day and I'm super sleepy now I can barely keep my eyes open. I hate this feeling.
customer_reviews.author: MoGo480

customer_reviews.title: I should have checked ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I did not try these. I looked up the ingredients and saw that one can lower blood pressure as well as cause problems with other areas (See Web MD). I have a lot of interaction issues and decided not to take a chance. If I had not opened the bottle, I would have returned it. My fault-always check the ingredients first.
customer_reviews.author: maestra

customer_reviews.title: They Work, and No Drowsiness!
customer_reviews.text: I can get motion sickness pretty severely. These worked for me when I went on a cruise. They work very quickly and don't make you drowsy or nauseous. They were a lifesaver and made it possible for me to enjoy vacation! Dissolve 1-2 under your tongue and repeat as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Weirdcrab77

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Went on a cruise to the Caribbean and depended on these, but they did not work. If you have serious motion sickness, these will not work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Yan

customer_reviews.title: Hasn’t performed anti gas and don’t know about nausea cause I Don’t have that problem.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thinking it would get rid of my over gased situation but after using it for nearly two weeks , it seems to be more for motion sickness. The bix said it stops the gas problem bu mine seems worse if anything and bloating is certainly worse.
customer_reviews.author: Joehorse

customer_reviews.title: Perfect all natural medicine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new York trip a few years ago and it helped me. So for my recent trip to Canada, I bought a new bottle and tried it. It helped me again. I love how it doesn't have any taste and melts on your tongue. However I do think that it causes me not to sleep during the flight no matter how tired I am, no matter how much I would want to
customer_reviews.author: Jan3t

customer_reviews.title: Works great for car sickness.
customer_reviews.text: Since moving to the country my 3 year old has been getting really car sick and was throwing up all the time. I got these and kept them in the car and he hasn’t thrown up since he would tell me he’s getting sick I’d give him two and it would stop the nausea pretty instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Tera Allridge

customer_reviews.title: This product works great, I usually get sick on cruise ships but ...
customer_reviews.text: This product works great, I usually get sick on cruise ships but not with this natural product. It also helped family members who usually do not get sick to feel much better with just 1 pill. I also was just diagnosed with Vertigo and this product also helps me when I feel the dizziness coming on.
customer_reviews.author: diane smith

customer_reviews.title: Works VERY well and does NOT cause drowsiness
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I have been using this for years! I started giving these to my daughter when she was 4. (she's 12 now) It's homeopathic so it's safe and doesn't' make her feel sick. We both get seriously sick from motion sickness when we are on rocky boats or driving on twisty/turny roads. However, we take these before we get on the boat, then another one when we are just on the boat, along with the seabands and we are fine. We NEVER feel sick or tired, ever! Happy to travel for hours on a boat. It's a must in our medicine cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: FCNY

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: Love hylands products. These are great for me and my kids to use for short drives. Longer drives, flights, and cruising I still use something stronger for myself but the kids do great with using these tablets.
customer_reviews.author: cdhc

customer_reviews.title: God send
customer_reviews.text: Best decision I made. I bought this intending to use on a cruise but I didn't end up using it. Ffwd 7 months later I was on our honeymoon, I developed the worst stomach infection ever. Vomiting ,nausea let's just say I hated life for 14 hours. Thanks to this little wonder I was able to make it through, get fluids in me and enjoy the rest of my trip as the nausea lingered. I took as was directed and didn't have to worry about toxins and side effects. I plan on making it a staple at our home. Literally a life saver
customer_reviews.author: Nwachineke

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff- I have MS and sometimes get dizzy- this helps I also take with me when my teenager drives, so when I start feeling a bit woosy I can take two and it helps

customer_reviews.title: It never really happens, now!
customer_reviews.text: A solution for embarrassment. Solves the problem and the discomfort.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Took a little 4 day cruise and the second I started to feel queezy I took a few of these and it stopped almost immediately! So glad I decided to purchase these instead of paying a $50 copay for a patch!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Previously purchased at the health food store on the advice of the doctor. I wouldn't be without it!

customer_reviews.text: we love these things we were in Maui and going on the road to Hana and we bought these and now we order them on Amazon because we don't live in Maui we love these things so much
customer_reviews.author: Princesamama80

customer_reviews.title: Work well for me
customer_reviews.text: I love these because I hate being nauseated for any reasons. These help a lot for those times when you are feeling a bit queasy. Probably won't work if you are truly sick.
customer_reviews.author: lhj313

customer_reviews.title: works - on whale watching expedition (no whales tho)

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This works so well! I don’t have to take the drowsy medicine anymore. I took them along on a trip and did several things that used to make me sick and I didn’t even get nauseous!

customer_reviews.title: Can’t believe how much it works!!
customer_reviews.text: I have two kiddos who always throw up with long car trips. We just spent 61.5 HOURS in the car, driving to see family for Thanksgiving over multiple states. NOT ONE TIME OF THROW-UP!! I would give these to my kids every 4 hours. I love how it dissolves in the mouth, which allows me to easily dose my special-needs child. This worked wonders! I will never take a road trip again without bringing these pills along!

customer_reviews.text: I purchased this motion sickness medicine for our most recently trip. He took this in the morning and did not feel any sick ness throughout our rough/choppy boat ride. I would recommend this product as this is also a natural remedy.

I pop 2 of these 10-15 minutes before I ride the train and they are a tremendous help. They melt under your tongue so easily. Will keep buying these.

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I take 2 or 3 tablets (dissolve under the tongue) when traveling in the car on winding roads, in a boat on choppy water, or in a plane in case of turbulence. I typically have been uncomfortable in these situations due to motion sickness, but I do not have that icky feeling when I take these pills. I don't know if it's a placebo effect or "real" but hey, it works for me without any side effects like sleepiness or stomach upset. I'm grateful to have them!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah E.

customer_reviews.title: This is really helping with my acid reflux. I ...

product_meta.title: Motion Sickness, Nausea Relief Tablets, All Natural Treatment for Car Sickness and Sea Sickness, 50 Count
feature_bullets: When it comes to dealing with motion sickness, we’ve got you covered.
Hyland's Motion Sickness is a traditional homeopathic formula for the relief of symptoms of nausea and dizziness associated with or aggravated by motion.
This product is also useful for relief of car sickness and sea sickness.
Hyland's Motion Sickness stimulates your body's natural healing response to relieve symptoms.
Hyland's Motion Sickness is safe for adults and children and can be used in conjunction with other medications.
